price: Say, “Whether you spend willingly or unwillingly, it will never be accepted from you, for you have been a wicked people.”
arabic: قُلۡ أَنفِقُواْ طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡهٗا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
